kw.name: Create Session

test.name: Register New Restaurant Successfully

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://localhost:5000/api/v1/restaurants path_url=/api/v1/restaurants headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.5', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '101', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"name": "Spice Garden", "category": "Indian", "location": "North", "images": [], "contact": "98765"}'

POST Response : url=http://localhost:5000/api/v1/restaurants status=201, reason=CREATED headers={'Server': 'Werkzeug/3.1.5 Python/3.10.11', 'Date': 'Sat, 21 Feb 2026 07:05:49 GMT', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Content-Length': '165', 'Connection': 'close'} body={ "approved": false, "category": "Indian", "contact": "98765", "enabled": true, "id": 4, "images": [], "location": "North", "name": "Spice Garden" }
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.

kw.name: Status Should Be
kw.doc: Fails if response status code is different than the expected.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Dictionary Should Contain Key
kw.doc: Fails if ``key`` is not found from ``dictionary``.

kw.name: Set Suite Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.
